name: @nightwatch/schematics
description: Adds Nightwatch to an existing Angular CLI project

scripts.build:clean:launch: npm run build && npm run clean:launch
scripts.build:clean:launch:v12: npm run build && npm run clean:launch:v12
scripts.clean:launch: npm run clean && npm run launch
scripts.clean:launch:v12: npm run clean:v12 && npm run launch:v12
scripts.clean: git checkout HEAD -- sandbox && git clean -f -d sandbox
scripts.clean:v12: git checkout HEAD -- sandbox-v12 && git clean -f -d sandbox-v12
scripts.launch: npm run link:sandbox && cd sandbox && ng add $npm_package_name --remove-protractor --environment='chrome' && npm link ../ && ng run sandbox:nightwatch-run --headless
scripts.launch:v12: npm run link:sandbox:v12 && cd sandbox-v12 && ng add $npm_package_name --remove-protractor --environment='chrome' && npm link ../ && ng run sandbox-v12:nightwatch-run --headless
scripts.link:sandbox: npm link && cd sandbox && npm link $npm_package_name
scripts.link:sandbox:v12: npm link && cd sandbox-v12 && npm link $npm_package_name
scripts.unlink:sandbox: cd sandbox && npm unlink $npm_package_name && cd .. && npm unlink
scripts.dev:build: cd sandbox && npm link ../ && ng run sandbox:nightwatch-run
scripts.test: npm run build:clean:launch && npm run test:sandbox && npm run clean
scripts.test:sandbox: cd sandbox && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && npm run e2e

author: Vaibhav Singh <vaibhav.s@browserstack.com>
